projects.title: E-Commerce Django Store
projects.subtitle: Full-Stack E-Commerce Website
projects.description: A complete e-commerce platform built with Django framework during my final semester college project. Features include product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, order management, and payment integration.
projects.introduction: This e-commerce platform was developed as my final semester college project using Django framework with HTML templates and Jinja templating engine. The project demonstrates a complete online shopping experience with modern web development practices. Built with focus on user experience, security, and scalability.
projects.author: Your Name
challenges: Optimizing database queries for better performance
Creating responsive design for all devices

projects.title: Paper Trading Platform
projects.subtitle: Stock Market Simulation Website
projects.description: A comprehensive paper trading website built with Next.js that allows users to practice stock trading without real money. Features real-time market data, portfolio management, and trading analytics.
projects.introduction: This paper trading platform was developed using Next.js to help users learn stock market trading without financial risk. The application provides a realistic trading environment with real market data, portfolio tracking, and comprehensive analytics to help users improve their trading skills.
projects.author: Your Name
challenges: Managing complex state for portfolio calculations

projects.title: Data Analysis Project
projects.subtitle: Python Data Science & Analytics
projects.description: Comprehensive data analysis project using Python libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Google Colab. Performed statistical analysis, data visualization, and machine learning on various datasets.
projects.introduction: This data analysis project showcases the power of Python for data science and analytics. Using industry-standard libraries like Pandas for data manipulation, NumPy for numerical computations, and Google Colab for cloud-based development, I analyzed various datasets to extract meaningful insights and patterns.
projects.author: Your Name
challenges: Dealing with missing and inconsistent data

projects.title: Personal Identity Mask Generator
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Image Processing Tool
projects.description: An innovative web application that uses AI and Python Pillow library to generate personal identity masks. This tool helps protect privacy by creating realistic face masks for profile pictures and social media.
projects.introduction: This AI-powered identity mask generator was developed to address growing privacy concerns in the digital age. Using advanced image processing techniques with Python Pillow library and AI algorithms, the application can generate realistic masks that protect user identity while maintaining visual appeal for profile pictures and social media use.
projects.author: Your Name
challenges: Ensuring user privacy and data security
